class.name: AnimationNodeBlendSpace1D
class.brief_description: A set of [AnimationRootNode]s placed on a virtual axis, crossfading between the two adjacent ones. Used by [AnimationTree].
class.description: A resource used by [AnimationNodeBlendTree]. [AnimationNodeBlendSpace1D] represents a virtual axis on which any type of [AnimationRootNode]s can be added using [method add_blend_point]. Outputs the linear blend of the two [AnimationRootNode]s adjacent to the current value. You can set the extents of the axis with [member min_space] and [member max_space].

method.name: add_blend_point
method.description: Adds a new point that represents a [param node] on the virtual axis at a given position set by [param pos]. You can insert it at a specific index using the [param at_index] argument. If you use the default value for [param at_index], the point is inserted at the end of the blend points array.

method.name: get_blend_point_count
method.description: Returns the number of points on the blend axis.

method.name: get_blend_point_node
method.description: Returns the [AnimationNode] referenced by the point at index [param point].

method.name: get_blend_point_position
method.description: Returns the position of the point at index [param point].

method.name: remove_blend_point
method.description: Removes the point at index [param point] from the blend axis.

method.name: set_blend_point_node
method.description: Changes the [AnimationNode] referenced by the point at index [param point].

method.name: set_blend_point_position
method.description: Updates the position of the point at index [param point] on the blend axis.

members.member: Controls the interpolation between animations. See [enum BlendMode] constants.
The blend space's axis's upper limit for the points' position. See [method add_blend_point].
The blend space's axis's lower limit for the points' position. See [method add_blend_point].
Position increment to snap to when moving a point on the axis.
If [code]false[/code], the blended animations' frame are stopped when the blend value is [code]0[/code]. If [code]true[/code], forcing the blended animations to advance frame.
Label of the virtual axis of the blend space.

constants.constant: The interpolation between animations is linear.
The blend space plays the animation of the animation node which blending position is closest to. Useful for frame-by-frame 2D animations.
Similar to [constant BLEND_MODE_DISCRETE], but starts the new animation at the last animation's playback position.
